title: [Bank of Ta'Illistim, Lobby]
description: The stained glaes rosette windows, capturing just enough moonlight from the night sky, cast a rainbow of shimmering color across the bank's pure white marble floors.  A richly hued Loenthran carpet, vibrant in shades of wine, sapphire and emerald, rests in front of the bank's entrance.

The stained glaes rosette windows cast a rainbow of shimmering color across the bank's pure white marble floors.  A richly hued Loenthran carpet, vibrant in shades of wine, sapphire and emerald, rests in front of the bank's entrance.

The establishment's patrons wander through a corbelled stone arch.  Fashioned of the same mica-flecked granite that graces the Sapphire Gate, the arch towers above, nearly reaching the peak of the bank's vaulted ceiling.  The arch is carved with a pattern of sinuous dahcres.

Fashioned of the same mica-flecked granite that graces the Sapphire Gate, a corbelled stone arch towers above, nearly reaching the peak of the bank's vaulted ceiling.  The establishment's patrons wander through the opening as they go about their business.  Set back in the wall is a small alcove that is partially obscured by a curtain of ivory velvet.
